Hi,

The first problem may be your java envirenment not config 
correctly,please check again or google "java -classpath".

The code recorded with  Selenium IDE  can be saved as java language 
format by select the java format in Selenium IDE config windows.

following the step:
In firefox: Tools -> Selenium IDE
In Selenium IDE: Options -> Format -> Java Selenium RC

-- 
Please be free contact me for any question or suggestion.
Regards,
Thanks.
Yang
